device_classes_not_matching.description:
Device classes `{device_classes}` on source entities `{source_entities}` need to be identical for sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the device classes on the source entities and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
device_classes_not_matching.title: Device classes are not correct

state_classes_not_matching.description:
State classes `{state_classes}` on source entities `{source_entities}` need to be identical for sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the state classes on the source entities and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
state_classes_not_matching.title: State classes are not correct

uoms_not_matching_device_class.description:
Units of measurement `{uoms}` of input sensors `{source_entities}` are not compatible and can't be converted with the device class `{device_class}` of sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the unit of measurement on the source entities and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
uoms_not_matching_device_class.title: Units of measurement are not correct

uoms_not_matching_no_device_class.description:
Units of measurement `{uoms}` of input sensors `{source_entities}` are not compatible when not using a device class on sensor group `{entity_id}`.

Please correct the unit of measurement on the source entities or set a proper device class on the sensor group and reload the group sensor to fix this issue.
uoms_not_matching_no_device_class.title: Units of measurement are not correct

reload.description: Reloads group configuration, entities, and notify services from YAML-configuration.
reload.name: Reload

object_id.description: Object ID of this group. This object ID is used as part of the entity ID. Entity ID format: [domain].[object_id].
object_id.name: Object ID

add_entities.description: List of members to be added to the group. Cannot be used in combination with `Entities` or `Remove entities`.
add_entities.name: Add entities

all.description: Enable this option if the group should only be used when all entities are in state `on`.
all.name: All

entities.description: List of all members in the group. Cannot be used in combination with `Add entities` or `Remove entities`.
entities.name: Entities

icon.description: Name of the icon for the group.
icon.name: Icon

object_id.description: Object ID of this group. This object ID is used as part of the entity ID. Entity ID format: [domain].[object_id].
object_id.name: Object ID

remove_entities.description: List of members to be removed from a group. Cannot be used in combination with `Entities` or `Add entities`.
remove_entities.name: Remove entities
